sentence: (Biggs, along with fellow Arizona congressman, Rep. Paul Gosar, and Rep. Mo Brooks (R-Ala.) worked with #StopTheSteal organizer Ali Alexander to pressure lawmakers to overturn the 2020 election results during the Jan. 6, 2021 joint session, according to a statement by Alexander in a now-deleted video).
author: Jordan Green
title: REVEALED: Trump-anointed Arizona candidate has questionable ties to the Bundys, the Oath Keepers and the controversial 'Constitutional Sheriffs'

sentence: Controversial Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) "has found a new home" on a far-right social media platform, The Arizona Republic reported Tuesday.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Republican Paul Gosar defends notorious white nationalist: report

sentence: Controversial Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) is taking a stand in a GOP primary two states to the east as Republicans battle each other in the 2022 midterms.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Paul Gosar endorses ‘dumbest guy in Congress’ in primary against Texas AG Ken Paxton

sentence: Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) said that the Republican Party, and leaders like Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) now answer to people like Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Lauren Boebert (R-CO).
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Adam Kinzinger trashes Kevin McCarthy: He's beholden to Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar

sentence: Last November, staffers for Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) posted an "anime"-style video showing him decapitating Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) and attacking Biden with swords.
author: Josh Israel
title: Arizona GOP Candidate Posts Video Threatening To Shoot Democrats

sentence: "Far-right Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) are untouchable inside the House Republican conference," Axios reported.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Republicans are 'frustrated by the constant distractions' from Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar: report

sentence: The petition, from a group called Faithful America, is addressed to “RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel” and says “As grassroots Christians from across the country, we call on the RNC to censure Representatives Marjorie Taylor Green and Paul Gosar for taking part in the explicitly white nationalist America First Political Action Conference.” McDaniel did issue a statement over the weekend condemning “white supremacy, neo-Nazism, hate speech and bigotry are disgusting and do not have a home in the Republican Party.” Both Greene and Gosar have been roundly condemned for addressing the conference hosted by white nationalist and Holocaust-denier Nick Fuentes.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Nearly 13,000 Christians Sign Petition Calling on the RNC to Censure Reps. Greene and Gosar For Addressing White Nationalist Group

sentence: Also in attendance was Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who received widespread condemnation for attending a white nationalist conference the previous weekend.
author: Bob Brigham
title: WATCH: Mike Lindell sells a GOP candidate — and his pillows — at Arizona rodeo

sentence: More forceful and specific condemnation by GOP leaders against Republican Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar for participating in a recent white nationalist event in Florida, for example, would go a long way toward conveying that message and countering this toxic propaganda," they wrote.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Top midwestern paper calls out the GOP for allowing white nationalists to 'flourish' in scathing editorial

sentence: Kelly reportedly took in more than $55,000 in contributions during the last fundraising quarter of 2021 from “PACs of corporate trade groups and the Senate leadership committees of many of his fellow Democrats.” In 2021, he also took heat from the Arizona Republican Party chair Kelli Ward, Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), and the National Republican Senatorial Committee (NRSC) for being “missing in action” and for the lack of leadership the freshman member has in the Senate.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Democrat Mark Kelly Trails Generic Republican in AZ Senate Race

sentence: “And there was miscommunication.” Gosar spoke to AFPAC in-person in 2021: Rep. Paul Gosar is helping Nick Fuentes recruit young conservatives to his white nationalist, Christian nationalist ideology https://t.co/1yZuAV3oq4 pic.twitter.com/8rzfAhSv5S — Right Wing Watch (@RightWingWatch) March 12, 2021 When asked about addressing the White nationalists again this year, Gosar reportedly shrugged it off.
author: Kipp Jones
title: Paul Gosar Blames ‘Miscommunication’ With Staffer For His Address to White Nationalist Nick Fuentes’ AFPAC
